answer_texts: I appreciated the app loading quickly and the layout being easy to navigate, but the outage notice interrupted access to recent charges. The delay made it difficult to review my bill when I needed to. The support chat provided some guidance, yet the responses were slower than I would expect during an outage. I eventually understood the steps to check the status and the process was clarified, but it left me frustrated. Overall, outages like this undermine confidence, and I hope improvements are made quickly.

The billing issue was reported multiple times but the resolution was not as fast as I hoped. The initial guidance did not resolve the discrepancy, which added to my frustration. I had to provide additional information, causing more delay. When the correction finally happened, I was relieved but the experience could have been smoother. I would like to see faster, clearer communication during such incidents.

The mobile experience during the outage was challenging but not unusable. The screens occasionally timed out, yet the alerts helped me stay informed. Afterward, the account balance updated to reflect the changes, which was reassuring. The overall process felt strained by the outage, but the team seemed to be working on a fix. I hope future outages are handled more gracefully.

answer_texts: I found the online bill payment straightforward and quick. The steps were easy to follow, and the interface looked clean. I received a confirmation email promptly, which reduced worry about the payment. The process felt reliable and kept me informed at every stage. Overall, I would recommend this feature to others because it saved me time and avoided potential errors.

Viewing the detailed invoice initially had a small hiccup, but I managed to navigate around it. The help section was accessible and offered practical guidance. The layout is intuitive and not cluttered, which I appreciate. I could save my payment details for future use, which was convenient. The experience remained efficient despite the minor issue.

Support through chat could be improved; I waited a bit for a response which was a bit frustrating. When I got to speak with a representative, they were polite and tried to resolve the issue. The issue that initially concerned me was billing accuracy, and while it was resolved, the delay left me a little cautious about relying on automated systems. In the end the account was corrected and I could proceed with peace of mind. I would like to see faster follow-up next time.

answer_texts: App performance during the latest update was generally adequate but not flawless. The interface loads quickly for most sections, which I value. I did notice occasional slow responses when switching between screens. Notifications and tips were helpful and kept me informed during use. Overall, the experience with the app was acceptable, and I would consider continuing to use it.

Billing and pricing information was presented clearly without surprises. I found the pricing details easy to understand and compare. The features offered matched my expectations based on the plan. The checkout flow was smooth and transparent for a business customer. While not perfect, the app overall provided good value.

The mobile app continues to be intuitive with a clean layout. The response times were generally good, though occasional delays occurred during peak hours. Customer support was courteous when I reached out. The information on my account updated promptly after changes. Overall, I am satisfied but see room for further improvement.
